caption.p:
Estimated average proportions of the classical and emerging strains in the study area. ( A) The plain lines correspond to the simulated proportions and the red crosses correspond to the proportions of CS in the data. ( B) Simulated proportions of the ESs obtained by assuming that the CS is absent. In both cases, the parameter values correspond to the MLE
